### Exercise 2

```{r}
mets <- Teams  %>% 
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN")
my_mets <- mets %>% 
  dplyr::filter(yearID>=2004 & yearID<=2012)
my_mets %>% 
  dplyr::select(W,L,yearID,teamID)
```

```{r}
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYN" & yearID %in% 2004:2012)
mets_ben

```
